title: Big Band Jazz Music Pack
description: 47 Tracks & 51 mins of Entertaining Big Band Jazz
longDescription:
A collection of Big Band Jazz music tracks for games that requires a touch of vintage class and elegance. Loops and stingers are included with 10 full-length ending versions.


Demos of every full-length track included within the pack available below:


YOUTUBE DEMO PLAYLIST


10 unique Jazz music tracks, where the high-energy horns and tight rhythm section of a Big Band provide a powerful driving force behind each track. Ideal for video games set in a period such as the 1920s or 1930s, or for games with a crime or detective theme. This music is also suitable for puzzle or strategy games that aim to convey sophistication and elegance, or that celebrate the dazzling lifestyle of the city. The lively and resounding 1940s Big Band swing has got the real Broadway vibe with all its glitter and sparkling glamour.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  1. Swing The Rhythm (main track, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  2. Big Band Savage Jazz (main track, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  3. Spy Jazz (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  4. New York Jazz (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  5. Jazz Entertainment (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  6. Sexy Smooth Jazz (main track, 2 loops, 2 stingers)
  7. Dixieland Jazz Street Band (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  8. Killer Jazz (main track, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  9. Jazzy Jazz (main track, 2 loops)
  10. Showtime (main track, 3 loops, 5 stingers)

Number of Audio Wavs: 47

Number of Audio Cues: 47

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 51:23

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.francescobiondimusic.com
